Person B: She’d lived an amazing life ... I thought one day I might make a film about her.

Person B: ... and a daily shot of green ginger wine.

Person B: Her second husband, Bill, had been a postman ... who wrote love notes on her mail.
Person B: Pinky told me she’d never got to hold her own parent’s hands ... she never said why ... her childhood was off limits.
